entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
